thread.title: Illinois lottery imposes new budget-driven payment delays on prizes
thread.title_full: Illinois lottery imposes new budget-driven payment delays on prizes - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Illinois lottery imposes new budget-driven payment delays on prizes
text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - The cash-starved Illinois lottery lowered the boom even harder on its players on Wednesday, saying anyone with a winning ticket worth $600 or more will face delays collecting prizes until the stateâ€™s long-running budget impasse ends.
